      • setEarlyStopping

        public void setEarlyStopping(int testSetSizePercent,
                             int checkFrequency)
        This function sets the test set size for an early stopping strategy (training is stopped, when the error of the test set begins to raise.
        Parameters:
        testSetSizePercent - The size of the test set in percent [0, 100)
        checkFrequency - number of episodes in which the the error is expected to be better than before (karrenz episodes)
